key.name: filters
key.summary: Window filters in the format of (patterns, active_opacity, inactive_oapcity, step).

key.name: toggle-glassy-window-key
key.summary: Shortcut to toggle glass-gnome for the active window.

key.name: inc-opacity-key
key.summary: Shortcut to increase the active opacity for the active window.

key.name: dec-opacity-key
key.summary: Shortcut to decrease the active opacity for the active window.

key.name: reset-opacity-key
key.summary: Shortcut to reset the opacity of the active window to default (the values in the filters).

key.name: auto-start
key.summary: Start Glassy GNOME when the system starts up.

key.name: mix-ratio
key.summary: Some special windows may require more opacity, modifying the mix ratio can increase the opacity for these windows. The larger the mix ratio is, the more opaque the window will be.
